resources.string: This screen allows the user log in the music app. If the user does not remember the password, It can be recovered with "Forgotten Account?" Also, a new user can be registered.
This screen shows the current song or by default a recent song played.
In this screen the user can search music.
Aquí no hay playa - The Refrescos
In this screen the user can choose among different radio stations.

In this screen the user can buy different songs. For instance, we can add a pay with PayPal Mobile Payment Libraries (MPL). Steps: download the Android Mobile Payments Library SDK, obtain an AppID, specify the PayPal environment you are adressing and the business PayPal Account as the receiver, calculate the price of the item, set the Payment Type, make the MPL payment call and when the payment flow is complete, MPL returns control to your app.
I have made this project thanks to:
